page.title: 08LONGBOROUGH CHURCH 1
page.content: The church of St. James is in the Parish of Longborough & Sezincote & is in the Gloucester Diocese.The rector is the Rev.E.Hyde.He is responsible for Longborough & Sezincote, Condicote,Upper & Lower Swell.He has been the rector for 14 years & the rectory stands in Longborough. Longborough Church dates back to Norman times.The churchyard was extended in 1956 & there are approx. 120 graves.On average 5 people a year die in the local parish. The church is heated by electricity.It is cleaned by a voluntary rota of men & women.Two organists, Mr. Gray & Mr. Gregson play on a voluntary basis.The church is run by the Parochial Church Council.Money donated by the congregation goes towards paying the bills for the church's running costs.
